name: Sakai-Peg USD
description: Sakai-Peg USD (sUSD) is a token concept launched from the community consent of Sakai DAO proposal ID#6. The introduction of sUSD suggests users can experience better liquidity and faster daily rewards through the farming pool with strategic partner - PAXE. Nevertheless, users can also experience Restaking Program, which allows them to optimize their earning potential and actively participate in the growth of the ecosystem.
